## Code Snippet
```python
# Quick script to check API endpoints
import requests

def check_endpoints():
    endpoints = ['/api/users', '/api/projects', '/api/tasks']
    for endpoint in endpoints:
        response = requests.get(f"http://localhost:8000{endpoint}")
        print(f"{endpoint}: {response.status_code}")
```
